meta.content: Technology; Education; Corrections; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

abstract.p: Correction to June 8 News Watch column about survey of students on ways in which they used Internet when selecting colleges; poll was sponsored by Embark.com and conducted by Art & Science Group; Richard A Hesel, who works for Art & Science, published results; he is not publisher of group and group is not sponsored by Embark.com

block.p: A report in the News Watch column of Circuits on June 8 about a survey of 500 students on ways in which they used the Internet when selecting colleges included an erroneous reference to its sponsorship and to the role of Richard A. Hesel, who commented on the extent of the students' Web access. The poll was sponsored by an online educational services company, Embark.com, and conducted by the Art & Science Group. Mr. Hesel, who works for the Art & Science Group, published the results. He is not the publisher of the group, and the group is not sponsored by Embark.com.

A report in the News Watch column of Circuits on June 8 about a survey of 500 students on ways in which they used the Internet when selecting colleges included an erroneous reference to its sponsorship and to the role of Richard A. Hesel, who commented on the extent of the students' Web access. The poll was sponsored by an online educational services company, Embark.com, and conducted by the Art & Science Group. Mr. Hesel, who works for the Art & Science Group, published the results. He is not the publisher of the group, and the group is not sponsored by Embark.com.
